title: Slaughter Daughter [2012 - USA] low budget horror
description:
Slaughter Daughter (2012 - USA)

Horror

Slaughtered Heart Productions
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2140403/


Budget: $15,000 estimated

Freak Show Horror Film Festival - WON - Best Actress

The film follows the beautiful Farah who was once a beauty queen, but her mind has started to slip ever since she was stood up on her wedding day. She often hides inside her mind to escape from the horrors of her real life and it is here that she begins an obsession with the imprisoned serial killer Jackson Miles. She self-mutilates and sends a piece of herself to him as a sign of her affection and this lands her a stint at the local mental hospital. Upon her release she visits Miles on death row seeking a lesson in murder.
